eng.perks/a_day_well_spent/description: Going to bed with zero stamina gives a stamina boost the next day.
eng.perks/a_way_to_the_heart/description: Cooked Dishes given as Loved Gifts will reward more Heart Points than before.
eng.perks/ancient_inspiration/description: Crafting any object has a weekly chance of inspiring a new recipe from a unique recipe set.
eng.perks/appealing_reeling/description: Fish will become attracted to your Bobber from a greater range.
eng.perks/appealing_reeling_two/description: Fish will become attracted to your Bobber from an even greater range.
eng.perks/aquatic_antiquities/description: Aquatic Artifacts can sometimes be fished up.
eng.perks/award_winning/description: Cooked Dishes given as Liked Gifts will reward more Heart Points than before.
eng.perks/back_in_vogue/description: Artifacts will now sell for 25% more tesserae.
eng.perks/barnyard_bounty/description: Chickens and Cows will sometimes drop extra Produce.
eng.perks/barnyard_bounty_three/description: Sheep and Rabbits will sometimes drop extra Produce.
eng.perks/barnyard_bounty_two/description: Ducks and Horses will sometimes drop extra Produce.
eng.perks/bountiful/description: Watering a crop will occasionally drop a Seed version of it.
eng.perks/caffeine_crimes/description: Consuming an item with the Speedy infusion will now double both its speed boost and the buff's duration.
eng.perks/catch_of_the_day/description: Catching a Fish will sometimes refund the Stamina used.
eng.perks/close_bond/description: Animals that have been Pet and Fed for the day will receive an extra Heart Point increase.
eng.perks/copper_expert/description: The amount of Copper Ore required to craft Copper Ingots will be reduced by 1.
eng.perks/currency_of_care/description: When animals eat crops, either by hand feeding or by grazing, they will drop the currency Shiny Beads.
eng.perks/currency_of_care_three/description: Animals can now be fed cooked dishes and will reward more Shiny Beads based on the dish's star level.
eng.perks/currency_of_care_two/description: Animals that have been Pet and Fed for the day will sometimes drop Shiny Bead the next day in addition to their regular Produce.
eng.perks/deliberate_debris/description: Farm debris will spawn 50% less often. This perk can be toggled on and off.
eng.perks/dinner_for_two/description: Cooking a dish will sometimes create a bonus extra dish.
eng.perks/discount_treats/description: Heart shaped treats sold by Hayden will have a 10% price reduction.
eng.perks/dungeon_delicacies/description: Certain Cooked Dishes will occasionally drop from Treasure Chests in the Mines.
eng.perks/earth_breaker/description: Breaking a Rock in the Mines will occasionally destroy all other Rocks in a 1x3 area around it.
eng.perks/earth_breaker_two/description: Breaking a Rock in the Mines will occasionally destroy all other Rocks in a 1x3 area around it and is now more likely to occur.
eng.perks/eastern_road_scholar/description: An additional Dig Site will appear daily on the Eastern Road.
eng.perks/empowered/description: Crafting a Tool, Weapon, or Armor will be more likely to result in an available Infused version.
eng.perks/empowered_two/description: Crafting a Tool, Weapon, or Armor will be a bit more likely to result in an available Infused version than before.
eng.perks/fairy_cooking/description: Cooking a dish will occasionally result in a bonus Fairy Infusion, which grants a One-Time Revival buff when consumed.
eng.perks/fantastic_finds/description: You can no longer find Wooden Treasure Chests, and you are now more likely to find a higher tier of Treasure Chests.
eng.perks/feed_prepper/description: The Craft Time for all animal feed is reduced by 10 minutes.
eng.perks/feeding_frenzy/description: Hay and Grass Seed drop at double the usual amount from Cutting Grass.
eng.perks/forager/description: Chopping down a Tree will occasionally drop a seasonally appropriate Forageable.
eng.perks/former_farmers/description: A dig site will now appear daily on your farm, with a new artifact set to collect.
eng.perks/fortified_blacksmithing/descriptio: Crafting Armor will occasionally result in a bonus Fortified Infusion, which grants you an additional +4 HP when worn.
eng.perks/frenzy/description: Catching a fish will occasionally cause a fish school to spawn nearby.
eng.perks/full_class/description: Fish schools will all contain an additional Fish.
eng.perks/gemini_season/description: Animals gain the ability to occasionally give birth to twins as long as there is enough room in the mother's coop/barn.
eng.perks/generous_in_defeat/description: Monsters will occasionally drop twice as many items when defeated.
eng.perks/gift_exchange/description: When you throw an item into a resting Mimic Chest, it will drop two items instead of one.
eng.perks/green_thumb/description: Planting a Seed will sometimes also Water the soil of the targeted tile.
eng.perks/guardians_shield/description: Once per day, the first hit you take is nullified.
eng.perks/hammer_timing/description: The Craft Time for all crafting recipes will be reduced by 10 minutes.
eng.perks/hammer_timing_three/description: The Craft Time for all crafting recipes will reduce by an additional 10 minutes, bringing the total reduction to 30 minutes.
eng.perks/hammer_timing_two/description: The Craft Time for all crafting recipes will reduce by an additional 10 minutes, bringing the total reduction to 20 minutes.
eng.perks/harvest_horse/description: When your Mistmare runs over a forage spot or a fully grown crop, it will pop from the ground.
eng.perks/harvest_time/description: Slow-Growing crops now reach their first-time harvest a day earlier.
eng.perks/hasty_blacksmithing/description: Crafting Armor will occasionally result in a bonus Hasty Infusion, which grants you an additional 4% Speed Boost when worn.
eng.perks/heavy_duty/description: Tilling soil will sometimes drop a piece of Stone or Wood.
eng.perks/in_motion/description: Defeating a Monster will sometimes grant a brief Speed Boost.
eng.perks/iron_expert/description: The amount of Iron Ore required to craft Iron Ingots will be reduced by 1.
eng.perks/iron_hound/description: Breaking an Iron Node will occasionally drop an extra piece of Iron.
eng.perks/jump_attack/description: Jumping and then Attacking mid-air will damage enemies in a small radius.
eng.perks/leech_blacksmithing/description: Crafting a Weapon will occasionally result in a bonus Leech Infusion, which restores 1 HP each time it's used to attack a Monster.
eng.perks/legendary/description: Legendary fish can now appear when the season and weather conditions are right.
eng.perks/lightweight_blacksmithing/descript: Crafting a Tool will occasionally result in a bonus Lightweight Infusion, occasionally dropping Stamina orbs on use.
eng.perks/likable_cooking/description: Cooking a dish will occasionally result in a bonus Likable Infusion, turning the item into a Universally Liked gift.
eng.perks/living_off_the_land/description: Harvesting a crop will occasionally drop a cooked dish that uses the crop.
eng.perks/lost_to_history/description: Ritual Chamber Floors will sometimes appear in the Mines.
eng.perks/loveable_cooking/description: Cooking a dish will occasionally result in a bonus Lovable Infusion, turning the item into a Universally Loved gift.
eng.perks/lucky_haul/description: Catching a fish will sometimes drop double the amount.
eng.perks/lumberjack/description: Breaking a Branch will sometimes drop an extra piece of Wood.
eng.perks/masonry/description: Breaking a Rock will sometimes drop an extra piece of Stone.
eng.perks/material_world/description: Material drops from breakables in the Mines now drop twice as much.
eng.perks/maximum_milling/description: Crafting Animal Feeds at the mill will sometimes drop an additional item of the same kind.
eng.perks/mine_time/description: Movement Speed will increase for 10 seconds when you first enter a new Floor.
eng.perks/museum_quality_one/description: Digging up Uncommon Artifacts will become more likely.
eng.perks/museum_quality_three/description: Digging up Legendary Artifacts will become more likely.
eng.perks/museum_quality_two/description: Digging up Rare Artifacts will become more likely.
eng.perks/natural/description: Chopping down any tree will occasionally drop Hardwood.
eng.perks/natural_beauty/description: Biome Furniture Recipes will sometimes drop from Dig Sites in the Mines.
eng.perks/nice_ride/description: The appearance of large animals can now be unlocked at 5 Hearts to ride them.
eng.perks/nice_swing/description: Grants a chance that tilling refunds the stamina it uses.
eng.perks/ore_riginal/description: Biome-Specific Ore will sometimes drop from Breaking Rocks in the Mines.
eng.perks/ornamental/description: Harvesting a crop or forageable will sometimes drop a recipe teaching you how to make an ornamental furniture version of the plant.
eng.perks/out_of_juice/description: Enchanterns now briefly freeze in place after discharging.
eng.perks/perfect_catch/description: Uncommon and rare fish will become more common.
eng.perks/perfect_pollinators/description: Legendary bugs will now appear more often.
eng.perks/perfect_prefix/description: The infusion power of Infused Weapons will double.
eng.perks/prepared_picker/description: Harvesting a Forageable will occasionally drop a Seed version, if it can be grown.
eng.perks/prize_winning/description: Harvesting crops will occasionally drop coins based on 5% of their selling price.
eng.perks/pursuit/description: Digging up Peat, Sod, or Clay increases your chances of finding an Uncommon or Rare Artifact the next time.
eng.perks/quality_crafting/description: Crafting an Item will occasionally result in a bonus Quality Infusion, which grants it a 10% higher selling price.
eng.perks/quick_footed/description: Blue Sapling pools will grant a short Speed Boost rather than slow you down.
eng.perks/reclaimer/description: Biome-Specific Furniture will sometimes drop from Treasure Chests in the Mines.
eng.perks/refreshing/description: Watering a crop will sometimes refund the Stamina used.
eng.perks/resonance/description: Defeating an enemy can break a nearby rock.
eng.perks/restorative_cooking/description: Cooking a dish will occasionally result in a bonus Restorative Infusion, which grants an HP & Stamina Regen buff when consumed.
eng.perks/rocking/description: Clod Projectiles that are reflected back are now much more likely to critically strike.
eng.perks/school_crasher/description: Swimming into a Fish School will drop half its contained items without spending Stamina.
eng.perks/seasoned/description: Finding Uncommon or rarer Forageables will become more likely.
eng.perks/set_pieces/description: Crafting an item can occasionally give you two of it.
eng.perks/sharp_blacksmithing/description: Crafting a Weapon will occasionally result in a bonus Sharp Infusion, which grants it an additional +1 Attack Power.
eng.perks/shrine_savant/description: Using an Offering Shrine will bestow a short HP & Stamina Regen buff in addition to their usual effect.
eng.perks/sickle_sword/description: You can now use your sword to harvest crops quickly.
eng.perks/silver_expert/description: The amount of Silver Ore required to craft Silver Ingots will be reduced by 1.
eng.perks/silver_seeker/description: Breaking a Silver Node will occasionally drop an extra piece of Silver.
eng.perks/snacktime/description: The time it takes to eat has been reduced by half.
eng.perks/sonic_boom/description: If you attack the Essence Bat's sonic attack, unleash a Sonic Boom, damaging all enemies around you.
eng.perks/speedy_cooking/description: Cooking a dish will occasionally result in a bonus Speedy Infusion, which grants a Speed Boost buff when consumed.
eng.perks/steady_supplies/description: Sod, Peat, and Cattails can now be purchased at the Carpenter's Shop.
eng.perks/stoneturner/description: Artifacts will sometimes drop from breaking Rocks in the Mines.
eng.perks/sunken_secrets/description: Dive spots can now contain Sunken Artifacts.
eng.perks/sunken_treasure/description: Treasure chests are more likely to appear when diving.
eng.perks/superb_sower/description: You can now charge your seeds to spread them across a wider area.
eng.perks/taste_maker/description: Cooking Recipes will sometimes drop from Treasure Chests in the Mines.
eng.perks/the_bell_tolls/description: You will receive the Big Bell crafting recipe. When rung, the Big Bell calls out or sends in all animals into their buildings.
eng.perks/time_sensitive/description: The Craft Time for all blacksmithing recipes will be reduced by 10 minutes.
eng.perks/time_sensitive_three/description: The Craft Time for all blacksmithing recipes will reduce by another 10 minutes, bringing the total reduction to 30 minutes.
eng.perks/time_sensitive_two/description: The Craft Time for all blacksmithing recipes will reduce by an additional 10 minutes, bringing the total reduction to 20 minutes.
eng.perks/time_to_eat/description: The Cook Time for all cooking recipes will be reduced by 10 minutes.
eng.perks/time_to_eat_three/description: The Cook Time for all cooking recipes will be reduced by another 10 minutes, bringing the total reduction to 30 minutes.
eng.perks/time_to_eat_two/description: The Cook Time for all cooking recipes will be reduced by an additional 10 minutes, bringing the total reduction to 20 minutes.
eng.perks/tireless_blacksmithing/description: Crafting Armor will occasionally result in a bonus Tireless Infusion, which grants you an additional +4 Stamina when worn.
eng.perks/treasure_hunter/description: Treasure Floors will sometimes appear in the Mines.
eng.perks/treasure_trove/description: You can no longer catch Wooden Treasure Boxes, and you are now more likely to catch a higher tier of Treasure Box.
eng.perks/treasured/description: Treasure Chests will become more likely to appear in the Mines.
eng.perks/treemendous/description: Chopping down trees and stumps now drops double the amount of wood.
eng.perks/true_blue/description: Breaking a Sapphire Node will occasionally drop an extra Sapphire.
eng.perks/true_strike/description: Your Attacks will occasionally become Critical, doing double damage in the Mines.
eng.perks/underground_inspiration/descriptio: Coral and Crystals now drop materials twice as often.
eng.perks/unexpected_haul/description: Treasure Boxes will become more likely to appear when Fishing.
eng.perks/unpeatable/description: Digging up Peat, Sod, and Clay will sometimes drop double the usual amount.
eng.perks/waste_not_want_not/description: Cooking a dish will occasionally return one of its ingredients afterward.
eng.perks/weedline_watcher/description: Fishing up Junk will become less likely.
eng.perks/weedline_watcher_two/description: Fishing up Junk will become even less likely.
eng.perks/welcome_home/description: Newly bought or born animals will start at 1 Heart Level.
eng.perks/welcome_home_two/description: Newly bought or born animals will start at 2 Heart Level.
eng.perks/well_armed/description: Biome-unique Armor and Weapons will sometimes drop from Treasure Chests in the Mines.
eng.perks/well_placed/description: Out of Place Artifacts will sometimes drop from Dig Sites in the overworld.
eng.perks/well_watered/description: Watered crops will occasionally retain their water through the next day.
eng.perks/western_ruins_scholar/description: An additional Dig Site will appear daily at the Western Ruins.
eng.perks/what_a_catch/description: Fish have a chance of dropping coins worth 10% of their value when caught.
eng.perks/wind_down/description: The Mill Time for all mill recipes will be reduced by 10 minutes.
eng.perks/working_with_the_grain/description: Crafting an item will occasionally return one of its ingredients afterward.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_animal: The Crown has requested an additional supply of feathers and wool to help make bedding and blankets for those in need.
Ship 10 feathers and 10 wool of any kind.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_archae: The Capital Museum has requested local artifact shards from all around Aldaria as it conducts a research project.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_baked_: The Crown has put out a request for hearty main dishes to be shipped out to villages in the Western Mountains of Aldaria, to help offset a poor harvest in the region.
Ship 5 Baked Dishes of any kind.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_berrie:
The Capital Market has put out a request for fresh berries. They're always in high demand! 

I know it doesn't seem like much, but shipping out some berries would be a big help.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_copper:
An increase in the number of farms being established across rural Aldaria has meant that copper tools are in high demand. 

Shipping some out would help support these newer farms.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_crops/: Not every place in Aldaria is as bountiful as Mistria, and fresh crops would go a long way to help out areas that are still struggling to recover after the earthquake.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_fish/d: Bad weather up the coast has kept fishing boats from sailing out. Shipments of fish would go a long way to help until the storms clear up.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_flower:
Princess Delaphine has heard that there are no finer flowers in Aldaria than in Mistria! 

This is a special request to help supply the floral arrangements for her birthday celebration.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_golden:
There's no better way to show foreign dignitaries that Aldaria is back on its feet than to give them a meal made with all Aldarian ingredients! 

But to do that, chefs in the Capital will need the very best.
Ship 5 Golden Cheese and 5 Golden Mayonnaise of any kind.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_ingots:
Quality metal ingots are vital for work all over Aldaria, but supply simply hasn't kept up with demand. 

Shipping ingots would help projects that have stalled out.
Ship 10 Iron Ingots and 5 Silver Ingots.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_mine_f: The Royal Physician is requesting rare and unusual underground materials to see if any would be useful to his work.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_monste:
Linsberry Island has been reporting the appearance of unusually aggressive wildlife that the Capital has no previous record of. 

They're issuing a call to see if anyone has physical examples of something similar in the kingdom.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_soup/d: The Capital's soup kitchen has requested regional soups to help replenish its larder.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_stone/:
An old stone retaining wall recently collapsed along a well traveled road in the northeast. 

The surveyors want to build it back even better, so as much stone as can be spared is requested.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_stone_: Repairs and upgrades to the roads of Aldaria is an ongoing task. Additional paving materials would help to speed up the work!
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_tables:
The Capital is constructing a brand new orphanage, but has run into issues with not having enough woodworkers available. 

Help supply new furniture so the children can be moved into their new home as quickly as possible.
Ship 6 Dining Tables and 12 Dining Chairs of any kind.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_a_miners:
When the earthquake hit, we lost a lot of our gear in the mines.

I found my pickaxe, but Errol never found his. I'd love to return it to him!
Bring a Miner's Pickaxe to Olric.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_a_red_to: I require a red toadstool for something I'm working on. I will not be elaborating.
Bring a red toadstool to Juniper.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_a_rock/d: Hi, can someone bring me a cool rock? I'm collecting them! I'll give you a nice chair in exchange.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_a_rock/s: Bring a piece of stone to Olric.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_bait/des: I could use a little extra help getting the fish to bite. Can someone bring me a worm?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_baked_po:
I have a theory I'd like to test, but I need some help! 

Can someone bring me a baked potato? I think I can improve the recipe!
Bring a baked potato to Hayden.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_basil_th:
Would someone please bring me some herbs? 

I'm planning to make some herb salad but I'm a little short on ingredients.
Bring some basil and thyme to Valen.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_beet/des:
Winter's here and that means Beets!

I'd like to request the freshest, most mouthwatering Beet you can find!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_berries/:
I'm craving something sweet! 

If you bring me some wild berries, I'll teach you how to make berries and cream!
Bring some wild berries to Eiland.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_berries_: If someone would be so kind as to bring me some wild berries for my snack, I would be in your debt.
Bring some wild berries to Errol.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_bird_hou: I woke up to birdsong yesterday morning and quite enjoyed it. I'd like to request a Birdhouse to hopefully attract some new bird friends to my Clinic.
Bring a Bird House to Valen.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_blackber:
Could someone drop off some blackberries, please? 

I just love blackberry jam but I'm nearly out. If you can bring me some, I'll teach you how to make your own!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_blueberr:
It's blueberry season, so I want to make some blueberry jam! 

If you can bring me some, I'll share my recipe!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_bristles: You won't find a more comfortable stuffing for a chair than Capybara Bristles, which is why I require some.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_broccoli:
Can I request some fresh broccoli?

There's a tough recipe I want to try out...
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_bull_hor:
I've got some crafting orders that need Bull Horns to finish, but they're in short supply.

Can you help?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_burdock_:
It's burdock root season!

Could someone bring me one?
Bring a Burdock Root to Nora.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_butter/d: Any Chef will tell you that the one thing they can never have enough of is Butter! I'd like to request some.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_caterpil:
Luc's been asking me to get a friend for his caterpillar but I'm not sure where to get one. 

Can someone bring me one? I'll repay you with a bite to eat!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_catfish/: I need a catfish for a dish we're making at the inn! If you bring me one, I'll teach you my recipe!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_cheese/d: Mom says I can't eat a big chunk of Cheese as a meal, but I can't think of any scientific reason why not. Could I request some Cheese, for science?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_chestnut:
URGENT: I need some chestnuts! 

Please bring me some as soon as possible! I'll trade you an apple!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_clam/des:
Years ago Terithia showed me how to make the most delectable Clam Chowder, but I'm too old to be diving for the Clam I need off the coast.

Help a fellow out?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_clay/des:
I need to get my hands on some clay so that Dell can finish her "art project". 

Apparently she needs it to make a legendary sword?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_coconuts:
Would someone bring me some coconuts from the beach? 

This weather calls for a nice cold drink. Bring me some and I'll fix us up some coconut milk!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_cod/desc:
Anyone in the mood for a little ocean fishing?

I'm looking for a Cod, and I've got a recipe to share if you do!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_copper/d: I need some copper ore and I need it soon. If you can manage it, I'll pay you for it.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_copper/s: Bring some copper ore to March.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_copper_b: I've heard there's an amazing beetle found in the Mines... Please, I must have it for my collection! I'll trade for it!
Bring a copper nugget beetle to Luc.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_copper_i:
A trading partner wants to see the quality of the new copper coming out of the Mines.

Could I get a Copper Ingot?
Bring a Copper Ingot to Balor.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_copper_s:
I've saved up for a new Copper Shovel, but the Blacksmith's is so busy, I don't want to trouble them.

Could someone help me out?
Bring a Copper Shovel to Celine.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_coral/de:
I've read that ground up Coral can be good for growing certain types of plants.

Can someone bring me some?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_cranberr:
Would someone mind bringing me some cranberries? 

This chilly weather has me craving a taste of home. 

If you can bring me some, I'll share my recipe for cranberry orange scones!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_crystal/:
Rumor has it that crystals of marvelous quality can be found below the mines.

I would be willing to pay top tesserae for some.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_crystal_: I've heard of something called "Crystal Berries" that grow in Mistria, but I haven't been able to find any! Can I request some? I'd love to see what I can bake with them!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_daikon/d:
As the name suggests, Winter Stew is just the thing for a frosty day in Mistria!

Bring me a Daikon Radish and I'll share my recipe with you.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_daikon/s: Bring a Daikon Radish to Vera.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_deep_ear:
Luc wants to see a bug he's never seen before!

Can you help me be a cool big sister and find an insect from deep in the mines?
Bring a Deep Earthworm to Reina.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_duck_egg: Dozy likes a duck egg in his food every now and then, bring one to me.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_earthshr:
Don't know if it's found around these parts, but I'm looking for an Earthshroom.

I got a recipe to exchange for it that'll make it worth the hunt!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_eel/desc: I need a freshwater eel. Bring one to me if you want to know how to make a grilled eel rice bowl.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_eel/stag: Bring a freshwater eel to March.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_egg/desc:
Errol suggested that more protein in my diet could help with my excavation work.

May I request three eggs?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_emerald/:
The mines were once famous for the quality of their emeralds.

If you happen to find any, I'd pay handsomely.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_fennel/d:
Can you bring me some fennel if you find any growing east of town? 

I'll teach you how to make a spring salad in return!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_fog_orch:
Eiland claims he saw a "mystical, ethereal flower that seemed out of a bygone era" at the Western Ruins.

I've got better things to do then hunt for it, but if you find it, bring it to me.
Bring a Fog Orchid to Juniper.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_freshwat: Did you know that pearls come from oysters? I didn't! I can't afford a pearl, but I can request a Freshwater Oyster!
Bring a Freshwater Oyster to Maple.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_frog/des:
Every fantasy story I read has a talking frog in it! There's too many in the Eastern Road's pond for me to check them all.

Help me start my big adventure!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_gardenin:
Would someone bring me some sod and peat for a potting soil mix I'm testing? 

I'll share some fresh flowers from my garden in return!
Bring some sod and peat to Celine.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_garlic/d:
Could someone please bring me some garlic? 

Since garlic is in season, I'd love to make a batch of garlic bread. If you can bring me some, I'll share my recipe!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_glass/de:
It was hard enough to get glass before the earthquake, now it's near impossible!

I'll pay good money to whoever can find us some.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_glowberr: Looking for someone to gather Glowberries for me, I'd like to make some cookies.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_goby/des: Can I get someone to fish me up a Goby? They're good luck!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_golden_b: A Capital merchant with a high opinion of himself recently told me I couldn't expect something like Golden Butter out of Mistria. I'll pay handsomely to prove him wrong.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_hay/desc: I'd like to give my cows a little extra hay for being so good. I can swap it for some of their milk!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_haybale/: Can I request a Hay Bale? They've got a lot of design potential!
Bring a Hay Bale to Merri.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_heather/:
This time of year always makes me think of my mother's favorite flower, heather.

Could someone gather a few bunches for me?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_horse_ha: I could use some horse hair for my reupholstery work, please and thank you.
Bring 3 Horse Hair bundles to Merri.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_horserad:
It's salmon season again, and I'm craving some horseradish salmon!

If someone can bring me some key ingredients, I'll share my recipe!
Bring some salmon and horseradish to Terithia
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_ice/desc:
You'd be amazed at how much ice we need to stock up on to keep our drinks cold and our food fresh!

Would you mind helping out?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_iron/des:
Mister March said if I could bring him iron, he'd make me a sword!

I've been saving my allowance for forever to post this!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_iron_arm:
Armor styles have changed greatly throughout Aldaria's history.

I would like to request Iron Armor crafted in the modern style for my research.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_iron_ing:
Let's see how your blacksmithing is coming along, bring me an Iron Ingot.

Yes, [Ari]. I'm talking to you.
Bring an Iron Ingot to March.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_lemon/de:
I was planning to make some tea with lemon, but I'm short on lemons! 

If you have an extra one, can you bring it to me? I'll teach you my recipe!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_material: I'm slightly short on materials for a project. Can anyone spare some wood and stone? I can pay, of course!
Bring some wood and stone to Ryis.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_milk/des:
I've been experimenting with ice cream recently, and that takes a lot of milk!

Bring me some and I'll let you try out one of my recipes!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_monster_: Seeking a Monster Core to help settle an academic debate.
Bring a Monster Core to Juniper.
A customer of mine wants something unusual and daring to offset his new outfit. I'd like to request a Monster Fang to help in my design.
Bring a Monster Fang to Louis.
Now, I love to whittle, but I've been thinking of expanding out into other materials. Could I request a Monster Horn to practice on?
Bring a Monster Horn to Holt.

I've recently seen a curious new item called "monster powder" on the market.

I would like to investigate its uses. Bring some to me.
Bring some monster powder to Juniper.

I want to try forging something with these "monster shells" I've been seeing around.

I don't care to know where they come from, just bring me some.
Bring some monster shells to March.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_moon/des:
I had no idea Mistria was so far out in the country that I'd need to bake my own Moon Fruit Cake.

Luckily Dozy has chef training. Would someone bring me a Moon Fruit?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_moon/nam: Important Request for a Moon Fruit
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_moon/sta: Bring a Moon Fruit to Juniper.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_moon_fru:
Has anyone seen any Moon Fruit? They're quite hard to come by, but can be foraged around Mistria this time of year.

Please bring me one and I'll share a wonderful recipe for them!
Bring a Moon Fruit to Eiland.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_more_wil:
I'm working on a pie recipe, but I need some fresh wild berries. 

If you bring me some I'll teach it to you!
Bring some wild berries to Reina.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_morel_mu:
I would like to source a morel mushroom, as it's known to have anti-inflammatory properties. 

Please deliver one if possible.
Bring a morel mushroom to Valen.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_mullet/d:
Miss Terithia told me there's a fish called a Mullet, and I don't believe it!

I'd cough up my favorite snack if someone proves me wrong!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_noodles/: Maple keeps asking for Noodles, but then tells me "not these Noodles, the other ones!" I'm at my wit's end, can someone bring me a plateful to try to appease my little princess?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_onion/de:
I'm making my favorite Onion Soup, but I seem to be short on the most important ingredient.

Could someone bring me an Onion?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_orange/d:
Would someone be a dear and fetch me an Orange? I need to make a fresh batch of my famous Marmalade.

I'd be happy to reveal the recipe to you in exchange.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_perch/de:
I'm quite fond of Perch Risotto, but lack the fish.

If anyone is fishing in the river on a rainy day, please keep an eye out for it and bring one to me for the recipe.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_pike/des: Can I request a Pike? I hear fish is brain food, and I've never caught a pike so I figure they're pretty smart!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_pineshro:
Would someone bring me some pineshrooms? 

I'm really craving a nostalgic winter treat. If you don't mind bringing me some, I'll teach you how to make it!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_pink_sca:
If I'm going to become queen someday, I need to get more comfortable giving orders... 

Bring me a pretty seashell... please!
Bring a pink scallop shell to Maple.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_pomegran: Can I request a glass of Pomegranate Juice? There's nothing more refreshing!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_pond_ska:
Mom says I can't keep trying to catch a Pond Skater, cause I keep falling into the water when I miss!

Can someone help me catch one?
Bring a Pond Skater to Luc.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_potted_p: Hard to keep plants around the Inn, since Luc keeps making them into his bug's habitats. Can I request a Potted Plant so he can have a designated place for them?
Bring a Potted Plant to Hemlock.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_pudding/: I recently read a treatise on Puddings, and now I can't stop thinking about them. May I request one?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_rabbit_w:
Rabbit Wool is essential for high quality garments, and one of my preferred materials to work in.

Please bring some to me!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_riceball: I'd like to request a Riceball, I need something I can eat while working.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_roasted_:
This crisp weather has me in the mood for Roasted Chestnuts!

Bring me some and I'll share my recipe with you.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_rooster_:
We could use some fresh Rooster Feathers to refill our guest pillows.

Could someone help us out?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_rose_hip:
I would like to request some fresh rose hips so I can make some seasonal jam.

They can be found fruiting on rose bushes when the weather gets cold. 

If you can bring me some, I'll share my recipe for rose hip jam!
Bring some rose hips to Valen.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_rosemary: I think my Rosemary might be getting a bit old, could someone bring me a fresh sprig now that it's back in season?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_round_ro:
I once saw an incredibly round rock in the mines, but it rolled out of sight before I could grab it!

If you see it, could you bring it to me?
Request for a Really Round Rock
Bring a Really Round Rock to Olric.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_ruby/des:
I realize this is a big ask, but I have a customer who's willing to pay well for a ruby. 

If you can get your hands on one, we can split the profits.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_salmon/d: If it's not too much trouble, could someone bring me some fresh salmon? Our last shipment was a little short.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_sap/desc: I don't like dipping into the shop's supplies for personal projects. Can I request 5 Sap for my woodworking?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_sapphire:
A friend went out of the way to do me a favor and I'd like to show him how much I appreciated it.

Could you find me a Sapphire?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_scarecro: I'm afraid my patch of garden has become a breakfast spot to some very unruly birds. May I request a Scarecrow so my vegetables remain unharmed?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_seaweed/:
Would someone please deliver some seaweed? 

This hot weather calls for a nice chilled seaweed salad. If you can bring me some, I'll share my recipe!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_sesame/d:
One of my favorite herbs in Mistria is the Sesame!

Bring me some and I'll show you a great dish to make with it.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_shadow_f:
The Codex Mistria has some very interesting flowers it says are native to the region including a "Shadow Flower".

I'd like to have one to see how it grows!
Bring a Shadow Flower to Celine.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_shards/d:
I'm seeking some shards as part of my archaeological research. They can often be unearthed at dig sites! 

If you come across any, could you bring me some?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_sheep_wo:
We're placing an order for new blankets for the inn soon, and I think it'd make them extra special to be made of wool from Mistrian sheep.

I'll need half a dozen!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_shipping: Can I request a Shipping Bin? We're running out of room at the Blacksmith's.
Bring a Shipping Bin to March.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_silver_i:
A personal friend in the Capital, who happens to be a rather famous jeweler, has been complaining about the silver shortage.

Please bring me a bar so I can make a gift of it.
Bring a Silver Ingot to Elsie.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_silver_o:
The prices for importing silver into Mistria are outrageous.

Dig some up for me, I don't need much.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_silver_s:
My father, Baron Wiscar, has requested I send him something that he can give to the King.

I can't think of anything more suitable than a Silver Sword!
Bring a Silver Sword to Adeline.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_smallmou: My parents really like Mistrian Smallmouth bass. Can I request a couple to send them?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_snail/de:
Mom said I shouldn't keep catching snails to bring home, but she didn't say I couldn't put up a request for one! 

Please help, I just need one more to complete the whole set!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_snowdrop: If you wouldn't mind bringing me one of those lovely flowers that grows by the Western Ruins, I can provide you with seeds to grow more.
Bring a snowdrop anemone to Elsie.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_strawber: Can someone bring me a strawberry? I'll share my recipe for strawberry shortcake as a reward!

Would someone please bring me a strawberry? 

I'm happy to share my recipe for strawberries and cream in return!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_striped_:
A fellow researcher has written to me with an unusual request for a Striped Bass from Mistria.

Could I prevail on someone to help me by catching one?
Bring a Striped Bass to Eiland.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_tea/desc:
My favorite tea has been in short supply for ages now.

Could I request some local tea instead?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_tideston: Dozy asked me to request someone bring him a "Tidestone", he thinks it'll be a real draw at the Bathhouse.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_tilapia/:
The Capital Museum has requested a Tilapia, but my skills do not lie in fishing.

There is a generous reimbursement if you can help.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_tomato/d:
Would someone bring me some tomatoes?

I could really go for some nice cool gazpacho! I'll make enough for both of us!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_trail_mi:
I like to keep plenty of Trail Mix on hand for the kids, but they sure eat a lot of it! Can someone mix some more up for me? You'll need Wild Berries and Water Chestnuts from the Narrows to make it!

Feel free to use the kitchen at the inn.
Bring 3 portions of Trail Mix to Josephine.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_trout/de:
I'm craving some smoked trout soup, but the fish aren't biting for me! 

If you can bring me a trout I'll teach you my recipe!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_tuna_sas: I've got a craving for Tuna Sashimi, but I just haven't had any luck with my catches! Can someone help out?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_turnip/d:
It's that time of year! I need to write a report on Mistria's spring crop yield. 

Could you bring me a turnip to inspect?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_ultimate: A friend of a friend has a horse that needs to be in tiptop shape for a race. I've been asked to procure Ultimate Large Animal Feed. You'll be well compensated for assisting me.
Bring 1 Ultimate Large Animal Feed to Balor.
Henrietta was a big help with farm chores the other day and deserves a special treat. Could someone bring me a bag of Ultimate Small Animal Feed?
Bring 1 Ultimate Small Animal Feed to Hayden.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_undersea:
I like seaweed fine in a cooked dish, but not too much by itself.

Maybe I just haven't tried the right kind. Bring me some I haven't tried before!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_water_ch:
I keep seeing folks enjoying Water Chestnuts in all the ways but the best way- deep fried.

Bring me some and I'll enlighten you to the recipe.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_wild_ber:
There are many ways to use the Mistrian Wild Berry, but in my opinion there's no finer way than in a fresh scone!

Bring me some wild berries and let me share the recipe with you.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_wild_lee:
Could someone bring me a wild leek? I'm a little short for my soup recipe. 

I'll give you a bowl to take home in return!
Bring a wild leek to Reina.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_wood/des: Can someone bring me some wood to help us restock? I'll pay a fair price!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_wood_fen:
Could someone craft some wood fencing for me? 

Henrietta's been testing the integrity of my current enclosure and it's simply not meeting her standards.
Bring some wood fencing to Hayden.
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_birdhouse/descript: Ryis says the tree is ready for a birdhouse and asked me to come over to build it. What color should we paint it?
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_birdhouse/stages/0: Meet Ryis at the Carpenter's Shop.
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_change_of_greenery: Celine says the she can't get the sprout to grow any more and wants to brainstorm what to do. Is there something special it needs?
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_fine_discovery/des:
I believe I have discovered a way to attract a never before seen insect species. 

Can I count on you to assist me? If so, meet me inside the Sleeping Dragon Inn.
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_fine_discovery/sta: Meet Luc at the Sleeping Dragon Inn.
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_get_together/descr: Hayden asked me to come down to his house on Sweetwater Farm for a get together.
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_get_together/stage: Meet with Hayden at his house.
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_heartfelt_apology/: Taliferro asked me to meet him at the Sleeping Dragon Inn to give him a "commoner's insight" into crafting his apology.
Meet Taliferro at the Sleeping Dragon Inn.
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_mysterious_treasur: I've got an old chest gathering dust at the museum, and I just can't get it open. Could someone lend me a hand?
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_new_blend/descript: Darcy asked me to meet her at the Sleeping Dragon Inn to try her new coffee blends.
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_rewarding_choice/d: Adeline asked me to meet her in her office. She wants my help with an important choice as "an average Mistrian".
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_sapling/descriptio: Ryis wants me to meet him in his room to talk about a new tree for the cottage ruins. One step closer to a new birdhouse!
eng.quests/heart_quests/an_open_book/descrip: Balor wants to give me advice on the items I'm shipping. I should go meet him in the Inn to hear him out.
eng.quests/heart_quests/an_outside_consultan: Valen is struggling with her research into the panacea and wants to get Juniper's help. This might be tricky...
eng.quests/heart_quests/batch_312/descriptio: Valen asked me to bring her one piece of peat for her research. I hope it's not for flavoring her medicine...
eng.quests/heart_quests/batch_312/stages/0/o: Bring Valen one piece of peat.
eng.quests/heart_quests/becoming_junipers_gu:
Come and get your free health tonic at Juniper's Bathhouse! 

Clears your pores, freshens your breath, and side effects are minimal. 

Available while supplies last.
eng.quests/heart_quests/bird_song/descriptio: Landen asked me if I had any spare wood on the farm. He said to bring him 15 pieces for 150t!
eng.quests/heart_quests/chief_inspector/desc: Adeline asked me to come along for her next inspection of Mistria. We'll start from the Request Board.
eng.quests/heart_quests/chief_inspector/stag: Meet Adeline at the Request Board.
eng.quests/heart_quests/dark_omens/descripti: Stillwell asked me to meet him at the Sleeping Dragon Inn to help avert disaster.
eng.quests/heart_quests/dark_omens/stages/0/: Meet Stillwell at the Sleeping Dragon Inn.
eng.quests/heart_quests/extra_feed/descripti: Hayden has some extra feed to give me and wants me to meet him at his farm. I wonder how Henrietta's doing...
eng.quests/heart_quests/farm_fresh_sous_chef: Reina says she has something important she needs to ask me. I wonder if she's heard more about the Cooking Competition...
eng.quests/heart_quests/happy_anniversary/de: Hemlock asked me to meet him at the Sleeping Dragon Inn to help plan a date night for Josephine.
eng.quests/heart_quests/happy_anniversary/st: Meet Hemlock at the Sleeping Dragon Inn.
eng.quests/heart_quests/horsing_around/descr: Juniper wants to test another potion on me. I should go to the bathhouse before she tests it on someone else.
eng.quests/heart_quests/josephines_strays/de:
I'm having trouble with a stray cat. I just cannot get the poor dear to come out of the stables. 

Come talk to me and we'll come up with a plan!
eng.quests/heart_quests/josephines_strays/st: Meet Josephine outside of the Inn's stables.
eng.quests/heart_quests/lemonade_from_lemons: Balor asked me to join him for a meal at the Inn. Business must be good!
eng.quests/heart_quests/many_hands_make_ligh: Olric asked me to come help him and March out with their work. March said my blacksmithing is improving but Olric wasn't supposed to tell me that...
eng.quests/heart_quests/olrics_super_normal_: Olric asked me to meet him at the Bathhouse to help him with a "super normal" situation.
eng.quests/heart_quests/pie_in_the_sky/descr: Reina asked me to meet her at the Inn to taste test a new dish.
eng.quests/heart_quests/pie_in_the_sky/stage: Meet Reina at the Sleeping Dragon Inn.
eng.quests/heart_quests/real_fine_day/descri: Hayden says he has a day planned to help socialize Henrietta. Does the General Store let chickens inside...?
eng.quests/heart_quests/real_fine_day/stages: Meet Hayden at the General Store.
eng.quests/heart_quests/shield_of_the_realm/: March asked me in a short letter to stop by if I wanted part-time work. How loquacious...
Meet March at the Blacksmith Store.
eng.quests/heart_quests/shopping_buddy/descr: Reina asked me to join her in the General Store. She's on the hunt for ingredients to wow the judges of the cooking competition.
eng.quests/heart_quests/shopping_buddy/stage: Meet Reina at the General Store.
eng.quests/heart_quests/surprise_me/descript: March asked me to meet him at the Blacksmith's store but didn't say why.
eng.quests/heart_quests/surprise_me/stages/0: Meet March in his house by the forge.
eng.quests/heart_quests/sweet_memories/descr: Elsie asked me to meet her in her room at the Manor House to discuss her memoirs.
eng.quests/heart_quests/sweet_memories/stage: Meet Elsie in her room within the Manor House.
eng.quests/heart_quests/tall_dark_and_myster: Seeking help to unload supplies for the relief effort, paying 200t. Come talk to me.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_annual_check_up/:
It's time for YOUR free annual check-up! Yes you, the person reading this. 

Come to Valen's Clinic today for a healthier you!
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_big_one/descript: Terithia asked me to meet her at her shack to tell me about The Big One.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_big_one/stages/0: Meet Terithia at her house by the beach.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_manor/descriptio: Eiland says that the search for the Dragonsworn Armor has taken an unexpected turn. I should meet him at the manor.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_manor/stages/0/o: Meet Eiland at the Manor House.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_ruins/descriptio: Eiland asked me to meet him at the Western Ruins to look for more clues and possibly more Dragonsworn Armor.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_ruins/stages/0/o: Meet Eiland at the Western Ruins.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_saturday_market_:
The Saturday Market Committee Election is upon us again! I'm seeking re-election as Chief Councilor and I'd love your help, 

[Ari]. Meet me at the town square
Meet Nora at the town square.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_smell_of_drying_: Adeline asked me to meet her in her office to get a better understanding of the inner workings of the government.
Meet Adeline in her office within the manor house.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_stele/descriptio: Eiland asked me to meet him in front of the Manor House so that he can show me an interesting site on the grounds.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_stele/stages/0/o: Meet Eiland outside the manor house.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_unusual_seed/des: Celine asked me to meet her in her cottage to help her with a flower.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_unusual_seed/sta: Meet Celine at her cottage south of town.
eng.quests/heart_quests/water_and_soil/descr: Celine asked me to meet her at her cottage. The mystery seed hasn't sprouted yet and she wants my insight into what could possibly make this seed grow.
eng.quests/heart_quests/working_like_a_dog/d: Juniper asked me to come and help her with some "menial errands". How does Dozy put up with it...
eng.quests/heart_quests/working_like_a_dog/s: Meet Juniper in her room at the Bathhouse.
eng.quests/story_quests/a_gem_exchange/descr:
Looking for a discrete individual willing to exchange a sapphire for a ruby. Serious offers only. 

That means NO MORE sparkly rocks. Please, Dell.
eng.quests/story_quests/cop_some_ore/descrip:
My ore shipment is running late, and my lazy brother won't go into the "condemned, super creepy mine" for me, so someone else has to do it!

Bring me 3 pieces of copper ore! Or don't! Whatever!
eng.quests/story_quests/crafting_tutorial/de: Ryis asked me to meet him to review crafting.
eng.quests/story_quests/do_a_bro_a_favor/des:
Welcome to town! 

Have you noticed that Mistria is full of rocks? I've got just the tool for dealing with them, and it's all yours if you can do me a favor! 

Come talk to me for the details!
eng.quests/story_quests/find_the_weathervane: Hayden asked me to find his weathervane that was blown away in the windstorm. He said it might be somewhere in the Narrows.
Find Hayden's weathervane in the Narrows.
eng.quests/story_quests/friday_at_the_sleepi: Reina asked me to meet her after 6 pm at the Sleeping Dragon Inn, for a Friday night gathering.
Friday at the Sleeping Dragon Inn
Meet Reina at the inn after 6 pm on a Friday.
eng.quests/story_quests/greet_the_townsfolk/:
I'm sure you've met some of your neighbors already, but wouldn't it be nice to say hello to everyone? 

Don't be shy, introduce yourself!
Introduce yourself to all the townsfolk and then talk to Adeline. Your map can help you locate everyone!
eng.quests/story_quests/greet_the_vendors/de: The Saturday Market is finally back! It's set up in the middle of town, around the big fountain. Visit all four vendors, and then report back to me!
eng.quests/story_quests/greet_the_vendors/st: Talk to Nora after you've introduced yourself to the vendors at the Saturday Market in town.
eng.quests/story_quests/jos_cooking_class/de:
On your own for the first time and unsure how to feed yourself? 

Come to the Sleeping Dragon Inn for a free cooking class with Josephine! Learn the ins and outs of cooking!
eng.quests/story_quests/jos_cooking_class/st: Meet Josephine at the Sleeping Dragon Inn.
eng.quests/story_quests/museum_donation_want: Errol sent me a letter telling me to meet him at the Museum west of town. He says he is the new curator and wants to talk to me about donations.
Meet Errol at the museum in the Narrows.
eng.quests/story_quests/pharmacy_restock/des:
Dandelions are more than just a springtime weed, they have myriad useful medicinal properties. 

My stock is running low. Bring me a Dandelion at your earliest convenience.
eng.quests/story_quests/repair_haydens_barn/: Adeline asked me to meet her at Hayden's farm to work on a new project.
Deposit the required materials in the Donation Box outside of Hayden's barn, then bring 4000 tesserae to Adeline.
eng.quests/story_quests/repair_the_beach_bri: Terithia asked me to meet her and Adeline at the beach to work on a new project.
Meet Terithia and Adeline at the Beach.
Deposit the required materials in the Donation Box near Terithia's house, then bring 1000 tesserae to Terithia.
eng.quests/story_quests/repair_the_bridge/de: Adeline requested my help in repairing the bridge on the Eastern Road.
eng.quests/story_quests/repair_the_bridge/st: Meet Adeline near the bridge on the Eastern Road.
Deposit the required materials in the Donation Box next to the bridge, then talk to Adeline.
eng.quests/story_quests/repair_the_general_s: Adeline asked me to meet her at the General Store to talk about "Phase 2" of her plan to revitalize Mistria.
Go to the General Store to meet with Adeline.
Deposit the required materials in the Donation Box outside of the outside the General Store, then bring Adeline 3000 tesserae.
eng.quests/story_quests/repair_the_inn/descr: Adeline asked me to meet her at the Inn to talk about what's next for the town.
eng.quests/story_quests/repair_the_inn/stage: Deposit the required materials in the Donation Box outside of the Inn, then bring 6000 tesserae to Adeline.
eng.quests/story_quests/repair_the_mill/desc:
Adeline sent me an official-looking letter asking to meet her in her office at the Manor House. 

Sounds like she wants my help restoring the old mill in town.
eng.quests/story_quests/repair_the_mill/stag: Meet Adeline in her office within the manor house north of town.
Deposit the required materials in the Donation Box outside of the Mill, then bring 1000 tesserae to Adeline.
eng.quests/story_quests/repair_the_summit_st: Adeline asked me to meet her in front of the Manor House to talk about our next project.
Meet Adeline in front of the Manor House.
eng.quests/story_quests/replenishing_mistria: Adeline asked me to meet her at the Manor House to discuss Mistria's emergency supply reserves.
Go to the Manor House to meet with Adeline.
Ship 10 crops and then speak to Adeline.
Adeline asked me to meet her at Hayden's farm to go over the plan for Mistria's food reserves.
Deposit the required materials in the Donation Box outside of the Inn, then talk to Adeline.
eng.quests/story_quests/somethings_bugging_m:
I'm concerned that I never see anyone out catching bugs... I must do something about it! 

Do YOU want to catch bugs for FUN and SCIENCE? Come to the Inn and I'll help you get started!
eng.quests/story_quests/stinky_stamina_potio: Attractive and extremely talented bathhouse owner seeks a gopher to find and hand over a Lilac.
eng.quests/story_quests/tea_with_hayden/desc:
Can't thank you enough for your work on the mill, [Ari]! 

If you've got some time, come on over to my place. I'll put on the kettle and we can chat about ranching and raising animals!
eng.quests/story_quests/tea_with_hayden/stag: Meet Hayden at his house west of your farm.
eng.quests/story_quests/the_earth_tablet/des: I found another tablet with strange markings in the Mines. I should bring it to Juniper to discuss our next steps.
eng.quests/story_quests/the_earth_tablet/sta: Speak to Juniper about the Earth Tablet.
Offer the required items to the earth seal.
eng.quests/story_quests/the_fire_tablet/desc: I found another tablet with strange markings in the Mines. I should bring it to Juniper to discuss our next steps.
eng.quests/story_quests/the_fire_tablet/stag: Speak to Juniper about the Fire Tablet.
Offer the required items to the fire seal.
eng.quests/story_quests/the_shooting_star_fe: Today is the Shooting Star Festival! I should head over to the summit at 8pm to witness the gorgeous view. Elsie said that I should invite someone to go with me, as well.
Visit the Shooting Star Festival at the Summit after 8pm.
eng.quests/story_quests/the_spring_festival/:
The Spring Festival is soon! Celine wants me to collect as much Breath of Spring as I can which can be found in variety of places around Mistria. 

The more I collect, the better the festival will be!
Collect Breath of Spring before the upcoming festival.
Visit the Spring Festival in the town square.
eng.quests/story_quests/the_water_tablet/des:
I found a tablet with strange markings in the Mines. I'll need to figure out what it means before I can go any further. 

Perhaps Eiland could help me translate it?
eng.quests/story_quests/the_water_tablet/sta: Speak to Eiland about the Water Tablet.
Offer the required items to the water seal.
eng.quests/story_quests/unlocking_the_mines_: Eiland asked me to meet him at the Museum to discuss reopening the Mines.
Meet Eiland at the Museum west of town.

Errol has decided that we have improved the town enough to unlock the Mines! 

Meet him and Eiland at the entrance of the Mines.
Meet Errol and Eiland outside the Mines entrance.
eng.ranching/animals/alpaca/core/new_baby_bo: A new Alpaca was born! Enter new name
eng.ranching/animals/capybara/core/new_baby_: A new Capybara was born! Enter new name
eng.ranching/animals/chicken/core/new_baby_b: A new Chicken was born! Enter new name
eng.ranching/animals/cow/core/new_baby_born: A new Cow was born! Enter new name
eng.ranching/animals/duck/core/new_baby_born: A new Duck was born! Enter new name
eng.ranching/animals/horse/core/new_baby_bor: A new Horse was born! Enter new name
eng.ranching/animals/rabbit/core/new_baby_bo: A new Rabbit was born! Enter new name
eng.ranching/animals/sheep/core/new_baby_bor: A new Sheep was born! Enter new name
eng.spells/full_restore/description: Restores all of your Stamina and HP when cast.
eng.spells/growth/description: Fully grows crops in a 3x3 area when cast. It can also progress tree growth by 1 stage.
eng.spells/summon_rain/description: Summons a brief rain storm that waters all of your crops when cast.
eng.ui/tutorials/blacksmithing/steps/0/text:
Step 1: 
Open the blacksmithing menu by interacting with the anvil.
eng.ui/tutorials/blacksmithing/steps/1/text:
Step 2: 
Select what you want to craft 
on the left side of the menu.
eng.ui/tutorials/blacksmithing/steps/2/text:
Step 3: 
Materials, skill level, & time required to craft are on the right.
eng.ui/tutorials/blacksmithing/steps/4/text: Unlock skill perks to create infused items with special attributes!
eng.ui/tutorials/cooking/steps/0/text:
Step 1: 
Open the cooking menu by 
interacting with a kitchen.
eng.ui/tutorials/cooking/steps/1/text:
Step 2: 
Select what you want to cook on 
the left side of the menu.
eng.ui/tutorials/cooking/steps/2/text:
Step 3: 
Ingredients, kitchen lvl, skill lvl & time required are on the right.
eng.ui/tutorials/cooking/steps/4/text: Cooked dishes make great gifts, and will restore stamina and HP when eaten!
eng.ui/tutorials/cooking/steps/5/text: New recipes can be purchased and discovered in a variety of ways.
eng.ui/tutorials/cooking/steps/6/text: Unlock skill perks to create infused items with special attributes!
eng.ui/tutorials/crafting/steps/0/text:
Step 1: Open the crafting menu by 
interacting with a crafting station.
eng.ui/tutorials/crafting/steps/1/text:
Step 2: Select what you want to 
craft on the left side of the menu.
eng.ui/tutorials/crafting/steps/2/text:
Step 3: Materials, skill level, & time 
required are on the right.
eng.ui/tutorials/crafting/steps/4/text: New recipes can be purchased and discovered in a variety of ways.
eng.ui/tutorials/crafting/steps/5/text: Unlock skill perks to create infused items with special attributes!
eng.ui/tutorials/farming/steps/0/text:
Step 1: 
Use your hoe on cleared field areas to till the soil.
eng.ui/tutorials/farming/steps/1/text:
Step 2: 
Plant seeds on the tilled soil tiles.
eng.ui/tutorials/farming/steps/2/text:
Step 3: 
Water your crops every day until they are fully grown.
eng.ui/tutorials/farming/steps/4/text: You can purchase a shovel from the General Store when you want to expand your fields.
eng.ui/tutorials/farming/steps/5/text:
Sell, cook, or even feed
your crops to your animals!
eng.ui/tutorials/fishing/steps/0/text:
Look out for fish shadows when
exploring areas with water.
eng.ui/tutorials/fishing/steps/1/text:
Use your fishing rod to cast your
line near a fish, ideally in
their line of sight.
eng.ui/tutorials/fishing/steps/2/text:
Fish will nibble and bite the line.
Quickly pull them in when they bite!
eng.ui/tutorials/fishing/steps/3/text:
Fish schools will appear sometimes,
allowing you to easily catch
multiple fish in a row.
eng.ui/tutorials/fishing/steps/4/text:
Dive spots can also be seen in water
occasionally. Swim over to them and
then dive to see what's hidden!
eng.ui/tutorials/magic/steps/0/text:
Various magic spells will unlock
throughout the course of the game.
eng.ui/tutorials/magic/steps/1/text:
To use an unlocked spell, select
and pin it from the magic page
in your journal.
eng.ui/tutorials/magic/steps/2/text:
Press & hold the button prompt
indicated on the pinned spell's
icon to cast it.
eng.ui/tutorials/magic/steps/3/text:
Different spells require different
amounts of Mana. Mana restores
a little bit each day.
eng.ui/tutorials/magic/steps/4/text:
If you're lucky, you might
even come across a potion that
restores some Mana instantly!
eng.ui/tutorials/magic/steps/5/text:
More Mana orbs will unlock
throughout the game to increase
your maximum capacity.
eng.ui/tutorials/milling/steps/0/text:
Step 1: 
Open the milling menu by interacting
with the milling station.
eng.ui/tutorials/milling/steps/1/text:
Step 2: 
Select what you want to craft on 
the left side of the menu.
eng.ui/tutorials/milling/steps/2/text:
Step 3: 
Ingredients and time required are on the right.
eng.ui/tutorials/mines/steps/0/text:
Exploring the Mines is a great way
to find new materials, forage, fish,
insects, and even treasure!
eng.ui/tutorials/mines/steps/1/text:
Break rocks on each floor to find 
a ladder, allowing you to progress
further downward.
eng.ui/tutorials/mines/steps/2/text:
Don't forget that you can jump
and swim as you explore!
eng.ui/tutorials/mines/steps/3/text:
Every 5 floors you will unlock an
elevator platform, allowing you to
travel quickly from the Mine's entry.
eng.ui/tutorials/mines/steps/4/text:
Proceed with care - magic seeping
into this world has turned inanimate
objects into monsters!
eng.ui/tutorials/mines/steps/5/text:
Upgrading your sword and armor
will aid you as you progress.
eng.ui/tutorials/mines/steps/6/text:
The entry's statue can also be used
to purchase helpful mining & combat
skill perks with collected essence.
eng.ui/tutorials/mistmare/steps/0/text: You can now summon the Mistmare while outdoors!
eng.ui/tutorials/mistmare/steps/1/text: Summon by using the new button on your screen, and customize in your journal's animal menu.
eng.ui/tutorials/mistmare/steps/2/text: The Horse statue can be used to purchase upgrades for your Mistmare.
eng.ui/tutorials/museum/steps/0/text:
Step 1: 
Open the museum menu by interacting
with the museum ledger.
eng.ui/tutorials/museum/steps/1/text:
Step 2: 
Put the items you want to donate
into the donation box and hit "Donate".
eng.ui/tutorials/museum/steps/2/text:
You will see which sets your items
went into, and how close those sets
are to completion.
eng.ui/tutorials/museum/steps/3/text:
You can check the museum wings at 
the ledger to see set completion 
statuses and reward hints.
eng.ui/tutorials/museum/steps/4/text:
You can check item tooltips to see
if an item belongs to a set, and if
you have already donated it or not!
eng.ui/tutorials/ranching/steps/0/text:
Baby animals can be purchased from
Hayden's Farm once you've built a
Barn or Coop for them to live in.
eng.ui/tutorials/ranching/steps/1/text:
Adult animals will drop produce,
and can even be bred to unlock new
colors at 2 hearts!
eng.ui/tutorials/ranching/steps/2/text:
Make sure to feed and pet your
animals once every day to keep
them happy.
eng.ui/tutorials/ranching/steps/3/text:
Animals can be fed various ways.
Indoor troughs, grazing outside, and
even hand feeding are options!
eng.ui/tutorials/ranching/steps/4/text:
Animals like to be called outside 
on sunny days, but avoid bringing
them out in bad weather.
eng.ui/tutorials/skill_perks/steps/0/text:
Gather essence from activites such
as farming, fishing, mining, and more!
eng.ui/tutorials/skill_perks/steps/1/text:
Interact with Caldarus to
view the skill perks menu.
eng.ui/tutorials/skill_perks/steps/2/text: Select a perk to see its description.
eng.ui/tutorials/skill_perks/steps/3/text:
Purchase a skill perk with
essence to unlock it!
eng.ui/tutorials/spring_festival/steps/0/tex:
Breath of Spring flowers can drop
as a bonus item when completing
various activities.
eng.ui/tutorials/spring_festival/steps/1/tex:
These activities include farming,
fishing, mining, and more!
eng.ui/tutorials/spring_festival/steps/2/tex:
Try to collect as many as you can by
the Spring Festival on the 17th!
eng.ui/tutorials/spring_festival/steps/3/tex:
The more you collect, the better
the rewards, decor, and festival
booth inventories will be!
